TEXT_STMBDA407_02506_TODO_05<tab>Speak with Hien.
TEXT_STMBDA407_02506_LYSE_000_000<tab><yawn> That was just what I needed!
TEXT_STMBDA407_02506_GOSETSU_000_005<tab>A new beginning lies beyond the horizon. We have but to seize it with our own two hands.
TEXT_STMBDA407_02506_CIRINA_000_010<tab>Was the food to your liking? Good, good...
TEXT_STMBDA407_02506_HIEN_000_020<tab>Now then, Cirina, if you would tell us of the trial we must undertake that we might participate in the Naadam.
TEXT_STMBDA407_02506_CIRINA_000_021<tab>Ah, yes! As I mentioned before, to be recognized as warriors of the Steppe, one must follow in the footsteps of the legendary warrior Bardam.

TEXT_STMBDA407_02506_CIRINA_000_022<tab>He embarked on a great pilgrimage, eschewing cart and horse, and walked for many malms until he came to a holy place, thereafter named Bardam's Mettle. There, at the altar, as he did, you must pray.
TEXT_STMBDA407_02506_CIRINA_000_023<tab>The altar lies deep within the breeding grounds of the yol. To complete your trial, you must tame one. Only then will your trial be complete.
TEXT_STMBDA407_02506_HIEN_000_024<tab>Fair enough. And where is the entrance to Bardam's Mettle?
TEXT_STMBDA407_02506_CIRINA_000_025<tab>You must journey far, far to the west─beyond Chakha Zoh, where lie the bones of a great and wise woman.
TEXT_STMBDA407_02506_CIRINA_000_026<tab>Beyond the ruins of Ceol Aen, hidden within the mountains is a narrow pass. Follow it, and you will come to Bardam's Mettle.
TEXT_STMBDA407_02506_LYSE_000_027<tab>Sounds to me like it'll be a trial just getting to the trial...
TEXT_STMBDA407_02506_CIRINA_000_028<tab>More than you may know. On the eve of the Naadam, many strive to improve their fortunes─some by abducting and enslaving the warriors of other tribes.
TEXT_STMBDA407_02506_CIRINA_000_029<tab>Be ever mindful of your surroundings, lest you be taken as well.
TEXT_STMBDA407_02506_HIEN_000_030<tab>Hah! What grim expressions you wear while nodding so powerfully! Warriors such as you are not like to fall en route to a mere rite of passage.
TEXT_STMBDA407_02506_HIEN_000_031<tab>We shall proceed with all due caution, yes, but let us not worry overmuch.
TEXT_STMBDA407_02506_HIEN_000_032<tab>We will overcome this trial, and the next, and the next, until we stand triumphant. That is all there is to it, no?
TEXT_STMBDA407_02506_HIEN_000_033<tab>With me, my friends! To the west! To Bardam's Mettle!
TEXT_STMBDA407_02506_CIRINA_000_034<tab>W-Wait, Hien! Oh dear. I knew I would forget.
TEXT_STMBDA407_02506_CIRINA_000_035<tab>Here─take these whistles. Once tamed, your yol will hearken to their call.
TEXT_STMBDA407_02506_LYSE_000_036<tab>Thanks. We'll try them out once we've finished the trial.
TEXT_STMBDA407_02506_LYSE_000_037<tab>Let's catch up to Hien and Gosetsu!
TEXT_STMBDA407_02506_CIRINA_000_040<tab>It is indeed a perilous journey, but I know you will succeed─as I once did.
TEXT_STMBDA407_02506_LYSE_000_050<tab>We still have a long way to go, but I think I can see that monument Cirina talked about.
TEXT_STMBDA407_02506_LYSE_000_051<tab>I don't see Hien or Gosetsu, though. We should hurry!
TEXT_STMBDA407_02506_LYSE_000_060<tab>Hey...I don't know about you, but I can't shake the feeling someone's watching us.
TEXT_STMBDA407_02506_LYSE_000_061<tab>Cirina did warn us about tribes that kidnap warriors and make them fight for them. Something tells me we're about to meet them...
TEXT_STMBDA407_02506_BALLOON_000_062<tab>The foreigners!
TEXT_STMBDA407_02506_BALLOON_000_063<tab>Your blood shall water the soil.
TEXT_STMBDA407_02506_LYSE_000_070<tab>They're wearing yellow. I've seen their clothes somewhere before...
TEXT_STMBDA407_02506_GOSETSU_000_075<tab>Is that the best you can do!? Come, villains! Come at me!
TEXT_STMBDA407_02506_HIEN_000_080<tab>Ah, there you are. As you can see, they left us little choice.
TEXT_STMBDA407_02506_HIEN_000_081<tab>I gather you were forced to dispatch a few yourself? So it goes. A few less warriors to face in the Naadam, eh?
TEXT_STMBDA407_02506_HIEN_000_082<tab>Ceol Aen is not much further. That said, I should be surprised if our would-be masters do not try to subdue us one final time...
TEXT_STMBDA407_02506_BALLOON_000_083<tab>They are here!? To arms!
TEXT_STMBDA407_02506_LYSE_000_090<tab><huff> <puff> This is it! The real trial!
TEXT_STMBDA407_02506_GOSETSU_000_095<tab>Tread softly. We are for hallowed ground, and the kami are restless...
TEXT_STMBDA407_02506_HIEN_000_100<tab>Right. This must be the pass that leads to Bardam's Mettle.
TEXT_STMBDA407_02506_HIEN_000_101<tab>They say no foreigners have overcome this trial, but, well, there is a first time for everything, no?
TEXT_STMBDA407_02506_HIEN_000_102<tab>Perhaps you do not hail from these lands, but your forefathers did. You do them honor to carry on their legacy this day.
